website_summaries.verdict: We like this eye gel for its light texture and non-sticky feel – both superior features for a good price.
pros: This eye gel has a cooling effect on this sensitive skin area making it pleasant to use
A little goes a long way, making it an economical buy
Those with delicate, older skin rave about how effective this gel was in reducing dark circles
cons: The scent of this product was unpleasant for some

customer_reviews.title: The greatest eye gel cream
customer_reviews.text: Within just a few days of using this product, I noticed a difference in my skin in the morning. It has now been about a few weeks, and fine lines around my eyes and the beginnings of wrinkles on my forehead are much less noticeable and smoother. Bye, bye dark circles... I can laugh now about it. The greatest eye gel cream! Thank you, OZ.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty Winsome

customer_reviews.title: Results are there
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this, I intended to return it. It stung the skin around my eyes mildly and has a distinct cinnamon smell I don't care for. I figured I would give it a try for a few days just to be sure, but wasnt expecting much. Turns out, the results justified the slight downsides! My fine smile lines are significantly reduced - I'm 35 and have just started to really notice them, but this has made a big difference; they're practically gone. It's not as effective on deeper lines, but I expected that. The light stinging never caused redness or itching and subsided after a week or two of regular use. Will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ariane Krenichyn

customer_reviews.title: Speechless
customer_reviews.text: This product is the fifth out of all of the Oz Naturals that I've tried. First of all I need to admit I've neglected my face for all of my life and just within the past three years I started trying products, I've become extremely picky of what I put on my face but when I started using Oz Naturals my faces has drastically improved in appearance, texture, and just overall for the best. This product in particular helped the puffiness and darkened under my eyes. Please, I know you don't know me but take my words on this line and give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Warnali

customer_reviews.title: I will always buy this product
customer_reviews.text: I used this product exclusively and loved the visible results. Then in March 2017 I bought the product in photo below. Slowly, I aged around the eyes. Now, I have gone back to OzNaturals eye gel and after just one use, I woke up and looked in the mirror to find instant results. I am not kidding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Very small amount
customer_reviews.text: I think it really helps with puffiness under my eyes. But in July I ordered a trial size for $1.19 which was a half of an ounce. I liked it, so this time I ordered what I thought was the regular size (not trial size). This time it cost $15.49. I should have checked more carefully, because when it arrived, it was exactly the same size as the "trial " one. I thought there was a mistake, but when I looked more carefully, that is what was advertised. I'm very disappointed because I like the product, but there's so little for so much money.
customer_reviews.author: Ms

customer_reviews.title: Opposite of intended effect: dry, pronounced lines, white crust
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand the glowing reviews for this product. It is drying, makes my fine lines more pronounced, dries white, and feels uncomfortably tight. Does not blend well with concealer, either. I am 29 and I was hoping to prevent any worsening of my few fine lines. Very disappointed that this product only makes them look worse. Worst skin care product I have ever purchased. Hard to see in the photo, the white crust this gel creates looks much worse in person!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn H. Tasker

customer_reviews.title: This is the Real Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I've found most beauty cures don't live up to the promises and promotions, leaving me somewhat of a skeptic. To my delight and surprise, this one actually works! I suppose it is unrealistic to expect dark circles to totally disappear, so my expectation is on the realistic side of this one. I've found the darkness has diminished, but not disappears; which is acceptable. The big surprise was the firming of the skin. It took regular application and some patience; but, all of a sudden, I noticed that the skin was firmer when I worked in the eye cream. Ladies, your quest is over. This is the freal deal - at last!
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Why did you change the formula?!!!
customer_reviews.text: WHAT HAPPENED!? This was my go to product for last couple years. This was it! Puffy under eye bags and I would apply this and they would be gone in about 30 minutes. NO you could not wear this under makeup but why bother? Eyes were no longer puffy. With this last order the formula has been tweaked yet again... to useless. Just like much higher priced products I’ve tried which were useless. I want my GOOD DR Oz formula back. Not this watery useless product which it has become. .
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: It Works....!
customer_reviews.text: Well......from a Guys point of view on this Product I will tell you this is by far the best Anti-Wrinkle Gel I ever used ! I did try in the past 2-3 others, but they do Not compare to this Product. You use very little, dab it under and around the eyes and within minutes any Bags or Wrinkles slowly disappear before your eyes ! Awesome product and I will continue to use every day ! Anyone looking for some help in this area, I def reco this product.
customer_reviews.author: JRiz

customer_reviews.title: This product is clear and the texture is like a serum but it does not soak into the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is clear and the texture is like a serum but it does not soak into the skin. It dries on the surface of the skin leaving it very dry, tight, and flaky. This product had a lot of good reviews so I wanted to try it but the negative reviews seem to have had the same results I did. It made my fine lines look more defined and left a white flaky crust on my skin. I'm not sure if they changed their formula since the older reviews say how great this is but I unfortunately will not be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Smell is awful!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when I made the first application! It smells atrocious! It's almost nauseating. I thought I would tough it out for an improvement in my dark circles. I applied the gel every night after I had washed my face with a gentle cleanser and applied my moisturizer (I have had irritation from previous eye serums so I started off slowly). I did this regimen for 2 weeks then I increased it to twice a day. I didn't see any change in my under eye area. Decided definitely not worth the stomach upset or my $15.49!
customer_reviews.author: Kimi-chan

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer! Keep it in the fridge for best results!
customer_reviews.text: I randomly stumbled upon Oz Naturals once and ever since then it has become my absolute favorite skin care brand! This eye gel is perfection for my puffy and dark under eye circles. I like to keep it in the fridge for an even more refreshing feeling. It keeps my under-eyes moisturized and healthy looking. Definitely helped with the darkness and it also brought my puffiness down significantly! It doesn't have a harsh scent and doesn't bother my eyes. I usually get very sensitive and my eyes start watering but never with these products.
customer_reviews.author: ioana_rd

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My newest favorite under eye product! Wow works immediately! You will feel a tightening under your eye. I was worried it would clash with my under eye concealer but it doesn't work well after it dries up. A little goes a long way. I use it twice a day, in the morning and at night. I will continue to use this product. On my Favorite list!
customer_reviews.author: Leo73

customer_reviews.title: IT REALLY WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product yesterday and immediately used it around my eyes. Within a few minutes I could feel the saggy skin under and above my eyes starting to firm up. I am absolutely amazed at how well this product works. I have drawers full of things I have tried and they never work. This one works and is priced right. My eyes look so much better without the huge bags and puffiness above.I shall be buying this for the rest of my life! Thank you OZNaturals for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Anderson

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way with this awesome eye gel!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this eye serum. Be careful when you pump it out because you need just a little. I pump it about half way and find that to be plenty. It has a great fresh natural smell that quickly dissipates and I've noticed a few of the finer lines lighten up after a few weeks of daily use. Definitely keeps the delicate skin around your eyes moisturized. The description says cream but the bottle says gel and that's what it is. I always feel like eye gels and serums tend to work better than lotions.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: I like the gel texture and hygienic packaging
customer_reviews.text: I like the gel texture and hygienic packaging. However, the product smells terrible, it's hard to describe. It is not a very strong smell, but it lingers for a very long time, so I can't use this product anymore.
customer_reviews.author: ZA

customer_reviews.title: I think the tight dry enhances fine lines so I like plump and moist better
customer_reviews.text: I started using this and it has been a few weeks. I do use an additional moisturizer on top of this as this product makes the skin under my eyes tight and dry feeling. I think the tight dry enhances fine lines so I like plump and moist better. I am giving this 3 stars as I haven't seen any dramtic results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer 1

customer_reviews.title: This Eye Gel  is a Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Once again the reviews are in and the Winner is...this delightful Eye Cream! Just a dab or two will do the trick when applying and then awake and see the pleasant results! I do also enjoy the fact that under the makeup this is perfect also, and I certainly am glad I did find it, right here on Amazon! I was not too happy with the long wait...for the merchandise to arrive, but next time I will pay extra and have it delivered sooner for sure!
customer_reviews.author: DMG

customer_reviews.title: Circles be gone
customer_reviews.text: Buy this eye gel! I had fairly minimal bags under my eyes, but darkness was more of a concern for me. I very much feel like this has helped with both issues. Because it is a gel, I do feel like it's slightly drying/tightening, so I layer a cream on top of it. It's doing its job though, so I don't at all mind using a cream on top!
customer_reviews.author: LeahJA

customer_reviews.title: The BEST for under eye bags!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down my fave product by Oz Naturals. We're talking holy grail product here! As I've entered my mid 30s, the one issue I haven't been able to get under control is puffy under eyes. In the past, I've set my alarm early for weekdays, placing cucumbers or green tea bags under my eyes for 30 mins before getting ready for work. It was the only thing that somewhat abated the bags and puffiness. This eye gel works wonders in reducing puffiness! It's astounding tosee the results, even just a few mins after applying the gel. You can often feel a tingly sensation as the bags start to disappear. I'm so grateful I stumbled upon this product.
customer_reviews.author: MrsBarbaraAnne

customer_reviews.title: Sticky texture
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product but I hated the texture. It wasn't smooth or creamy like other eye creams I've use but had a somewhat tacky texture that I didn't like and didn't feel absorbed well into my skin. I tried to use it long enough to see if I'd notice results that were good enough to make it worth putting up with the texture but was only able to tolerate the texture for about two weeks during which time I didn't notice any results.
customer_reviews.author: Tig

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this product since it arrived. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since it arrived...I swear by this!!! In 3 days my eyes look less dark and more awake...At 44 years old I can say...I found a permanent place in my beauty routine for this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great gel
customer_reviews.text: This gel is great. I use it about every other night and can feel a tightening effect within a few minutes of applying it. I’ve started patting a small amount on the “marionette lines” also, and it’s amazing how they almost disappear. Be careful and don’t use too much or it could begin to flake off as it dries. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: First one better
customer_reviews.text: It works, but my second one didn’t have vit e in it and is inferior to the first one with vit e. Also the second one causes crystals on the skin
customer_reviews.author: Taina Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: ... used the oz natural eye gel and its another fantastic product of theirs
customer_reviews.text: I used the oz natural eye gel and its another fantastic product of theirs. Ive tried many other eye creams, serums and lotions from other companies and this eye gel seems to work the best. It really helped with puffiness and dark circles. You definitely wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love how light it feels on the skin! Only a tiny drop is needed to cover both eyes. The gel applies easily and absorbs quickly. It has no scent and doesn't irritate the skin It can also be used as an eye mask by applying rochly on a cotton pad and keeping on undereyes for about 10 minutes
customer_reviews.author: ms0blonde

customer_reviews.title: It now seems to flake really bad to where it looks like crust all under my ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years now. It seems everytime I reorder it comes in a different container. This last time it came in yet another container but I also think the ingredients have changed. It now seems to flake really bad to where it looks like crust all under my eyes. Applying make up makes it look worse. I've trying using a smaller amount and still end up with crust. I'm so disappointed. I really liked this product up until now. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: BRHARMS

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED 😞
customer_reviews.text: I have been in the beauty industry for over 34+ yrs, I would NOT recommend this product to ANYONE. This eye gel "accentuates" your fine lines (instead of softening) and leaves a chalky like film. Very Disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kel

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this product in 2015 and liked it very much as it helped puffiness and dark ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in 2015 and liked it very much as it helped puffiness and dark circles fade. Not sure what has changed, if anything but I don't feel like the product yields the same results as before. Seems stickier and burns slightly more than I remember and my eyes don't seem to get as much help form this as it use to.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.text: First of all - I buy my products. So this is a completely uninfluenced review. Good overall product. Absorbs well and doesn't weight you down. I don't know if the effects are "dramatic" as other products since I don't use any other eye gel. But so far this have been worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Great eye gel
customer_reviews.text: I use to use a very expensive eye cream that I would have to order from a Consultant. It worked really well but when it ran out I wanted to see if I could get the same results from a less expensive product. This product has exceeded my expectations and I think works even better than the expensive product. I have suffered no dryness or irritating spots under the eye, and it's tight and the circles are lighten. I am a believer of this natural product!
customer_reviews.author: brandi dockett

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and Smelly
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product smelled so strongly of cinnamon (or something akin to cinnamon) that I could not use it as it made my eyes tear up uncontrollably.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Wanted it to work but...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product with the hope it will help reduce my eye baggage. Second week in there are no changes. I'll continue the product until it runs out but unless there is some miraculous change that occurs, I probably won't be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: I love this new eye cream from OZ!
customer_reviews.text: I love this new eye cream from OZ. It comes in a pump applicator and it definitely helps with any dark circles and/or puffiness around my eyes. It does not leave my skin feeling sticky, nor does it create any irritation to the delicate eye area, as some other products have done
customer_reviews.author: Janie Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: love this product. I use just a tiny drop under each eye AFTER makeup as it does not smear or have any residue lines, dries quickly and totally gets rid of any puffiness under my morning tired eyes. Lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could give less than one star.... horrible
customer_reviews.text: I like this line of facial products, but this eye gel is just terrible. I’ve been using it for a couple months and haven’t notice a bit of difference. All it does is leave a flaky white residue under my eyes. It’s drying and smelly bad. I didn’t even finish the bottle. Very upsetting! I wish I could return it. I don’t understand the great reviews at all.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: nice gentle eye gel
customer_reviews.text: This eye gel is amazing and is cold pressed. I have been trying to switch my health & beauty products to more natural products. This product is 98% natural. It is gentle for your eye area and works great. The eye gel blends in nicely and helps with my crows feet.I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: April Aakre

customer_reviews.title: Best Eye Cream/Gel
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best under eye gel I have ever purchased. Results after the first application. No irritation and it honestly and seriously works! I will be purchasing again....
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey T Collins

customer_reviews.title: ... a little over a week now and it's totally amazing. I rub it on my eyes twice a ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this eye gel cream for a little over a week now and it's totally amazing. I rub it on my eyes twice a day, it's really light, absorbs quickly and doesn't leave any residue. At first I thought because it's a gel, it will be sticky but it really ISN'T!! The wrinkles at the corner of my eyes are totally disappearing. I'm really loving this product
customer_reviews.author: Nike

customer_reviews.title: Another amazing Oz Naturals product!
customer_reviews.text: I use their other serums (Hyaluronic and Vitamin C) around my eye area, but adding this **really** stepped things up. I put it on first thing in the morning if my eyes look a little puffy, and it takes care of that immediately. Tightens the skin around my eyes, and definitely softens the crows feet. Almost an eye lift in a bottle! : )
customer_reviews.author: M. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: I like the cream better
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it a 3 star because to much comes out at a time, even when your careful to not press down all the way. It tightens the skin around the eyes but once you wash off, your eyes are back to the same way. I like the cream better.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Super Youth Eye Gel
customer_reviews.text: I love the cool gel feeling of Oz Naturals Super Youth Eye Gel. It feels so good on my eyes in the morning. Putting in on makes me feel refreshed and ready to face the day. It is not oily at all and unscented. I have been using this for a couple of years now and have been pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Ditto

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: Okay product. I am not prone to eye puffiness or crow's feet (only in my mid 30s) , but I do tend to get the dark circles. After a few weeks of using this product, I haven't really noticed any difference in the circles. It doesn't appear to hurt anything though, they certainly aren't any worse. I have typically been using this underneath my moisturizer and makeup in the morning. One pro is that is absorbs thoroughly into the skin, so there is no residual product left on the face.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Did not help with dark circles and bagginess under eyes after a 2 months and bad no return policy after 2 months no returns
customer_reviews.author: naturalman

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Put the eye gel cream on before applying the eye cream. It helps to reduce the amount use of cream making my eyes less oily, but yet still helping the skin stays moisturize. I am normal-oily skin so some nights I just use the gel cream. I enjoy the ease of using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few years now. I do not have any wrinkles around my eyes even though I have them elsewhere. If nothing else, it's a nice eye cream because it's very light.
customer_reviews.author: KY Woman

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This is a TINY bottle for the price and I haven't noticed it make much of a different so far. Been using it for a few months every night before bed and sometimes during the day. Long and often enough that some kind of result should show. Not sure I'll try it again.
customer_reviews.author: ProVocalist

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED
customer_reviews.text: This eye gel is everything!! You can feel it gently tightening your skin right after you apply it. I have been using it for about a week now and have definitely noticed a reduction in puffiness and dark circles. This gel has earned a permanent spot in my skincare routine!
customer_reviews.author: smitmae

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first eye gel that i have ever tried and I initially had mixed feelings. Overall i like the product, it is soothing once i got used to it. The first few applications burned the sensitive skin around my eyes a little bit, but after a few days, that stopped. It does seem to smooth out the finer wrinkles and has lightened my dark circles a bit. I just started using the eye cream today, so i am thinking that with the two products, i should be very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Pytak

customer_reviews.title: Fewer Wrinkles Noticed
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised to notice fewer wrinkles under eyes after several days of use. And this is done without retinol or other harmful ingredients?
customer_reviews.author: JB18

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I have been using OZNaturals Eye Gel for about 2 weeks. It's a slick, light gel. I have sensitive skin so I always worry about trying new products. I have had no allergic reactions from this product. So I would definitely recommend it for people with sensitive skin. What I like about this gel is I can see my under eye area is less puffy and more hydrated. I use it morning and night. You don't need to use much, a little goes a long way. It's a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Clgall

customer_reviews.title: Like the rest of the world
customer_reviews.text: Like the rest of the world, I don't get enough sleep, and my eyes tend to show it. This is soothing, yet non irritating. It suggests you can use it throughout the day, which I think you could without it upsetting your makeup...but I only use morning and night and find that perfectly adequate.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Heard a Lot About the Product; Wanted to Try It
customer_reviews.text: I like the product! It is easy to dispense, apply, and feels refreshing on your skin. It also seems to be working on the under-eye area!
customer_reviews.author: MJG

customer_reviews.title: Better than Before
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about a week. I love it! The serum goes on silky smooth. I love the feel of it. It helps my eye area feel so soft and yet a bit tight (in a good way). Although it is too early to tell, it seems to have softened the look of fine lines around my eyes. I'll definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the eye gel for about a month and notice a firmer appearance around eyes. I do use OZ Retinol cream over it for additional moisture in the evening. I will continue to use this along with the rest of the OZnaturals line! I feel better using natural ingredients on my skin at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Trutzie

customer_reviews.title: Tired Eyes
customer_reviews.text: My eyes never looked worse. I thought I was overly tired all week. Even my husband was commenting how tired I looked. I quickly realized this cream was the problem and stopped using.
customer_reviews.author: Mgd

customer_reviews.title: Eyes looked worse
customer_reviews.text: First time I applied it, stung the eyes badly. Had to wash it off. Thought it was the actives that caused this reaction since I was using it the first time. Tried again over the next few nights and funnily, no more stinging. However, I noticed that my eye bags, dark circles and lines had become much more pronounced. Very disappointed and had to stop. Did not work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cherish

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous eye cream
customer_reviews.text: At first I was not sure I liked this eye cream, but I realized that I was using too much and it left a residue. As soon as I started applying just a small amount, I fell in love with it. The bags under my eyes are noticeably reduced. Thank you OZ Naturals!
customer_reviews.author: moorecats

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Dark circles were not a problem for me but puffiness in upper and lower lids has been. I have seen a great improvement using this product and have had friends notice, to.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: I love that there is an instant tightening feel
customer_reviews.text: I love that there is an instant tightening feel. However, it did burn the first few uses. It no longer burns but I cannot use under make up as it cakes up and flakes off. Still use at night but probably wont reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie O.

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me at all, definitely one of the worst eye gels I’ve tried. Not only did it do nothing for the appearance of the skin around my eyes but it didn’t even soak in and just dried to a crust, leaving a white film. So glad I tried this at home before going out somewhere! Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: KA Shiff

customer_reviews.title: Banish dark circles for good
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed using this eye gel. I like it almost as much as the ultra ageless eye gel. It does the same job I just like distribution method of the other better and formula. Both help with my dark circles tho so they get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Thomas

customer_reviews.title: this is the BEST eye serum
customer_reviews.text: this is the BEST eye serum! I used it as a" booster" with my eye creams for better firming around eyes - can use on lids too. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Cinemares

customer_reviews.title: Good eye gel
customer_reviews.text: Very good eye gel. Helps relieve morning puffiness and soothe my tired eyes after a long day at work. The skin around my eyes is looking tighter and more youthful since using this.
customer_reviews.author: N. Loy

customer_reviews.title: The best in the market that I've found
customer_reviews.text: OZNaturals Anti Aging Eye Gel is amazing. My wife was blown away when she saw how it worked for me by eliminating wrinkles and pulling my eye area skin back to how it looked years ago. I've tried many other more expensive products, but this is absolutely the best by far. I've been using it for a few years now.
customer_reviews.author: HarryMichael

customer_reviews.title: I loved their retinol moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: It's OK, as it seems to tighten the skin under eyes but it makes my skin dry after few minutes. I will not be purchasing it again. I loved their retinol moisturizer. Too bad this one didn't work
customer_reviews.author: CodePink

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my eyes
customer_reviews.text: My under eye puffiness looked better but it irritated my eyes and I could not use it.
customer_reviews.author: A.P.

customer_reviews.title: always the best
customer_reviews.text: OZNaturals always the best in the market, I love their products
customer_reviews.author: sahar

customer_reviews.title: Good eye gel!!!
customer_reviews.text: Recently added this eye gel to my skin care routine and I like it. It's a great daytime eye gel, not thick or oily and doesn't irratate my eyes or cause my mascara to smear. I looked up ingredients on EWG website and the product is safe enough to use. Will continue using.
customer_reviews.author: State

customer_reviews.title: No need for puffy eyes!
customer_reviews.text: This eye gel team is very gentle on your skin and shouldn't irritate. I use it at night and feels that it makes a difference in the puffiness around my eyes and helps with the reduction of fines lines. Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: A. M.  West

customer_reviews.title: Turns flakey
customer_reviews.text: I do like the initial effects. It leaves a bit of a shine but I can live with that. However, I found that it turns flakey very quickly, within an hour or so. Looks like your skin is peeling. Tried using very little and then tried using more. Same reaction, starts to turn flakey.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Love how well it goes on and it soaks right ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for at least 2 years now. Love how well it goes on and it soaks right in, with no greasy feel. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane MC

customer_reviews.title: Used for over a year!
customer_reviews.text: I have VERY sensitive skin, this is the best product I have used!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: layers well under makeup!
customer_reviews.text: ok, i am SUPER picky about eye gels or eye creams. i wear concealer during the day and i need something that plays well with makeup. i loooove the consistency of this gel. it absorbs so fast and does not leave a greasy residue or roll off in little balls when i apply makeup on top. the eye gel also has a cooling effect which i love. highly recommended for daytime and evening use!
customer_reviews.author: coconutwater

customer_reviews.title: I love this eye cream/gel
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye cream/gel! It absorbs quickly, brightens and tones my undereye AND is a great base for my undereye makeup! I love the effects so much I even pat any excess onto a little wrinkle I have between my brows and it's helped there too! OzNaturals has great, high quality products. I can't wait to expand my skincare collection and try more!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn C

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for about 3 years and I really like that it does what it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Daily

customer_reviews.title: Fresh look for eyes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stuff + you can use on your whole face which is great when too much product comes out of the pump. Tightens skin under the eyes without feeling harsh. Love the way my eyes look more awake!
customer_reviews.author: A. Josey

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I don't see any positive results. And when applied only the eye cream it felt like it was drying my skin. I needed to put lotion on top of the eye cream.
customer_reviews.author: Amy T. Gold

customer_reviews.title: ... to start using eye cream and this is a good one! a little goes a long way so ...
customer_reviews.text: You're never too young to start using eye cream and this is a good one! a little goes a long way so this little container will last a while. Not sure what my long term results will be but I definitely feel like my eyes are brighter and less tired looking when I use this.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Sticky icky gel
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't seem to do anything; it's a sticky clear gel like 'astroglide' and dries leaving your skin feeling not any better moisturized. Feels like a wast of time and money to apply this strange fluid.
customer_reviews.author: vivian

customer_reviews.title: Oz Naturals Eye Gel
customer_reviews.text: This eye gel feels nice going on and makes my skin feel great. I have used a few other eye creams in the past and I can tell I have it on. Oz Naturals goes on clear and stays that way. I've been using this for a onto now and like it. I can't wait to see what several months will do for 60 year old skin.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Nevada Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I didnt notice much
customer_reviews.text: Theres no scent. It drys the area. I didnt see great resultes. Not to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: awatef

customer_reviews.title: It is full of great ingredients. You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This has helped with my dark circles and puffy eyes! It is full of great ingredients. You won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Boston33

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love the oz natural products..have been using them for a month ,love that I have all the items for the face.. works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Crows feet diminished!! Lasts a long time - ...
customer_reviews.text: Crows feet diminished!! Lasts a long time - you only need use a tiny bit. I'll stay with this product for my undereye area. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Honest Annie

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few days and already see a big difference in my under-eye bags. While the bags themselves are still there (probably genetic), they are much lighter in color and look brighter and tighter in general. I've been using this serum twice a day, in the AM and PM.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Klebine

customer_reviews.title: Night use
customer_reviews.text: It works. I only use it at night because I can't wear it under my makeup. I see a difference in the morning even after only a few hours of sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Lover

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many eye treatments over the years, this is probably one of the best. It definitely helps me with puffy eyes in the morning. I have been using this product for over a year and it really works.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first eye gel so I don't have anything to compare it to. I did, however, notice a significant reduction in the wrinkles under my eyes. Being 30, I feel like I'm a bit young to have the amount of wrinkles I had under my eye. This product definitely helped. Maybe it's not the best (I wouldn't know) but it is a good product with noticeable results.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I put it on my under eyes and eye lids and I love the way it makes me look
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way with this product! I put it on my under eyes and eye lids and I love the way it makes me look! My skin is so soft and I can really see my dark circles lightening up with each use. I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, does nothing but leave a layer of flaky residue under your eye.
customer_reviews.author: christy chang

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients, but
customer_reviews.text: I'm just not a fan of eye gels. This one has all of the right ingredients, but it makes the skin around my eyes feel tight after it dries. I don't like that feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Turkeylips

customer_reviews.title: I like the coolness to my skin when I put this ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 2 weeks and notice my under eyes are brighter and less puffy. I like the coolness to my skin when I put this around my eyes. I only use it at night as I do notice a white residue around my eyes in the morning. I have also been putting it on lines around my lips and the 11 lines. I only use one pump, but maybe that is too much for me. I will continue to use the product as I do like it.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I have used other eye gels but this product was amazing!!!! As soon as you apply it you can feel and see the skin tightening around your eyes. It also helps conceal dark circles. I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Gel Eye Cream is Fabulous purchased at Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye gel, which goes on easy, and absorbs quickly. I use it in concert with other Oz products and I love the way I look. I have tried many eye creams over the past thirty years, and have finally found an affordable one that smooths my skin and brightens. A plus is that it is long-lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Boj

customer_reviews.title: the first 2 containers were awesome- this last one not ...
customer_reviews.text: the first 2 containers were awesome- this last one not so much - I don't know if formula changed with new packaging but it doesn't seem as effective-
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: This works very well!!
customer_reviews.text: This is really effective at revitalizing skin around my eyes!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: just started using it... hard to give ...
customer_reviews.text: just started using it...hard to give a thumbs up or down at this time...does go on smooth and does not feel caked on after drying
customer_reviews.author: jinxlucky

customer_reviews.title: Meh! Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Really didn't help OR hurt orbital eye area. Not impressed. Found another on here much better.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca CohenTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Best yet
customer_reviews.text: I have used many products. This one is very good. It has not completely covered the dark circles underneath my eyes, but firms the skin to improve their appearance significantly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Baggett

product_meta.title: OZNaturals Anti Aging Eye Gel: Super Youth Eye Gel for Men and Women - Under Eye Treatment for Bags, Wrinkles, Crows Feet, Dark Circles, and Puffiness - Day and Night Anti Wrinkle Eye Gel - 0.5 Fl Oz
feature_bullets: YOUNGER LOOKING EYES: Firming and brightening dark circle corrector and puffy eye bag remover
SENSITIVE SKIN REPAIR: Silky eye cream moisturizer helps restore your undereye area’s youthful glow
PEPTIDE & ANTIOXIDANT RICH: Includes Matrixyl Synthe 6, plant stem cells, hyaluronic acid and more
ADVANCED FORMULATION: Non-GMO formula with Biopreserve Complex to be free of harmful preservatives
COLD PROCESSED BEAUTY: Formulated without heat to keep the pure potency of the natural ingredients
